flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Teresa and Morio is 71 - 59 = <<71-59=21>>21 years.
When their daughter is born, Teresa is 38 - 21 = <<38-21=17>>17 years old.
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
